SELECT * FROM ( SELECT arp.KEY_ AS defKey, arp.NAME_ AS processDefName, a2.name_ AS processCategoryName, a2.code_id AS processCategory, arp.ID_ as processId FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF arp LEFT JOIN act_process_type a2 ON arp.CATEGORY_ = a2.code_id AND a2.state_ = 0
ORDER BY arp.VERSION_ DESC ) a where 1=1
and processDefName LIKE concat(concat('%',#{processDefName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and processCategory = #{category ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
